metadata.description: Fake email mailbox fixtures for testing email sync, AI detection, and transaction extraction
metadata.notes: Emails organized by transaction stage and difficulty level

emails.subject: New Listing: 123 Oak Street - $450,000
emails.body:
Hi,

I wanted to share this new listing with you. The property at 123 Oak Street is now available for $450,000. It features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a spacious backyard.

Let me know if you'd like to schedule a showing.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson
ABC Realty
emails.bodyHtml:
Hi,

I wanted to share this new listing with you. The property at 123 Oak Street is now available for $450,000.
emails.snippet: I wanted to share this new listing with you...

emails.subject: Re: New Listing: 123 Oak Street - $450,000
emails.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for sending this listing. I'm very interested! Can we schedule a showing for this Saturday?

Best,
John

emails.subject: Purchase Agreement - 456 Maple Avenue
emails.body:
Dear Mr. Thompson,

Please find attached the purchase agreement for 456 Maple Avenue. The agreed upon price is $525,000 with a closing date of March 15, 2024.

Please review and sign by Friday.

Regards,
Mike Williams
Williams Law Group

emails.subject: Inspection Report Ready - 789 Pine Road
emails.body:
Hello,

The home inspection for 789 Pine Road has been completed. Overall the property is in good condition with a few minor issues noted:

- HVAC filter needs replacement
- Minor caulking needed around bathroom fixtures
- Recommend gutter cleaning

No major structural or safety concerns were found.

Full report attached.

Tom Baker
Baker Home Inspections

emails.subject: Appraisal Complete - Property Value Confirmed
emails.body:
Dear Client,

The appraisal for the property at 321 Elm Street has been completed. The appraised value is $485,000, which meets the purchase price requirement for your loan.

The lender has been notified and we are on track for closing.

Best regards,
Jennifer Adams
First National Mortgage

emails.subject: Closing Scheduled - March 20th at 2:00 PM
emails.body:
Hello Everyone,

I'm pleased to confirm that closing for 555 Cedar Lane has been scheduled for:

Date: March 20, 2024
Time: 2:00 PM
Location: First Title Company, 100 Main Street, Suite 200

Please bring valid photo ID and any remaining funds in the form of a cashier's check.

See you there!

Lisa Chen
First Title Company

emails.subject: Congratulations on Your New Home!
emails.body:
Dear John and Mary,

Congratulations on the successful closing of 555 Cedar Lane! It was a pleasure working with you on this transaction.

Your keys are enclosed, and all documents have been recorded with the county.

Welcome to your new home!

Warm regards,
Sarah Johnson
ABC Realty

emails.subject: Listing Agreement - 888 Birch Boulevard
emails.body:
Hi Sandra,

Thank you for choosing me to list your home at 888 Birch Boulevard. Attached is the listing agreement for your review and signature.

Key terms:
- List price: $395,000
- Commission: 6%
- Listing period: 6 months

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best,
David Kim
Premier Properties

emails.subject: Offer Received! - 888 Birch Boulevard
emails.body:
Great news Sandra!

We've received an offer on your property at 888 Birch Boulevard:

- Offer price: $385,000
- Earnest money: $10,000
- Closing date: 45 days from acceptance
- Contingencies: Financing, Inspection

The buyers are pre-approved and motivated. Let me know how you'd like to proceed.

David Kim

emails.subject: Weekly Newsletter - Top Real Estate Tips
emails.body:
Hello Subscriber,

Welcome to this week's real estate newsletter!

5 Tips for First-Time Home Buyers:
1. Get pre-approved before shopping
2. Don't skip the home inspection
3. Factor in closing costs
4. Research the neighborhood
5. Work with a qualified agent

Click here to read more!

Unsubscribe | Update Preferences
emails.notes: Newsletter with real estate content but not a transaction

emails.subject: Meeting Tomorrow - Project Update
emails.body:
Hi Team,

Reminder that we have our weekly project update meeting tomorrow at 10 AM in Conference Room B.

Agenda:
- Q1 progress review
- Resource allocation
- Upcoming deadlines

Please come prepared with your status updates.

Thanks,
Manager
emails.notes: Regular work email, not real estate related

emails.subject: URGENT: Claim Your $1,000,000 Prize Now!!!
emails.body:
CONGRATULATIONS!!!

You have been selected as the WINNER of our international lottery!

Claim your $1,000,000 prize by clicking the link below and providing your bank details.

ACT NOW - This offer expires in 24 hours!

Click here to claim: http://suspicious-link.com/claim

emails.subject: Your Amazon Order Has Shipped
emails.body:
Hello,

Great news! Your order #123-456-789 has shipped and is on its way.

Estimated delivery: January 30, 2024

Track your package: [Tracking Link]

Thank you for shopping with Amazon!

emails.subject: Title Search Complete - No Issues Found
emails.body:
Dear Valued Client,

We have completed the title search for the property at 999 Walnut Way.

Results: The title is clear with no liens, encumbrances, or ownership disputes.

We are ready to proceed with title insurance issuance.

Please contact us if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Title Services Team
Secure Title Company

emails.subject: Property showing tomorrow at 2pm
emails.body: hi just confirming the showing tomorrow at 2pm for the house on main st. thanks!
emails.notes: Informal email, no formal address - harder to classify

emails.subject: Mortgage Pre-Approval Letter
emails.body:
Dear John Smith,

Congratulations! Based on our review of your financial information, you have been pre-approved for a mortgage loan.

Pre-Approval Details:
- Maximum loan amount: $400,000
- Estimated rate: 6.5%
- Term: 30-year fixed
- Valid for: 90 days

This pre-approval is subject to property appraisal and final underwriting.

Please contact your loan officer with any questions.

Sincerely,
Home Lending Team
Big Bank Mortgage

emails.subject: Counter Offer - 777 Spruce Street
emails.body:
Hello,

The sellers have reviewed your offer and would like to counter with the following terms:

- Counter price: $340,000 (original offer was $325,000)
- Closing date: 30 days from acceptance (vs 45 days requested)
- All other terms remain the same

Please review and let me know your response by end of business tomorrow.

Regards,
Listing Agent

emails.subject: Your credit score has changed
emails.body:
Hello,

Your credit score has been updated. Log in to your account to view your new score and see what's changed.

Monitoring your credit is important, especially if you're planning to apply for a mortgage or other loan.

View your score now: [Link]

Credit Monitoring Service
emails.notes: Credit monitoring email - mentions mortgage but not a transaction

emails.subject: HOA Documents for Your Review
emails.body:
Dear New Owner,

Welcome to Sunset Ridge Community! As part of your purchase, please review the following HOA documents:

1. CC&Rs (Covenants, Conditions & Restrictions)
2. Bylaws
3. Current Budget
4. Meeting Minutes from last 3 meetings

Monthly dues are $250, due on the 1st of each month.

Please sign the acknowledgment form and return within 10 days.

Sunset Ridge HOA Board

emails.subject: Exclusive Investment Opportunity - Limited Time!
emails.body:
Dear Investor,

Don't miss this exclusive real estate investment opportunity!

Our fund has consistently delivered 15%+ returns on commercial property investments.

Minimum investment: $50,000
Projected returns: 15-20% annually

Schedule a call with our investment team today!

This is not a solicitation in jurisdictions where prohibited.
emails.notes: Promotional/spam email with real estate investment theme

emails.subject: Disclosure Documents - Please Review Before Showing
emails.body:
Hi,

Before we proceed with showings, please ensure your clients have reviewed the attached disclosure documents:

- Seller's Property Disclosure
- Lead-Based Paint Disclosure (required for homes built before 1978)
- Natural Hazard Disclosure

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
Listing Agent

emails.subject: Re: New Listing: 123 Oak Street - $450,000
emails.body:
Hi John,

Saturday works great! I have you scheduled for 11:00 AM.

Address: 123 Oak Street
Date: Saturday, January 20th
Time: 11:00 AM

I'll meet you there. Looking forward to it!

Sarah

emails.subject: Rent Due Reminder - February
emails.body:
Hello Tenant,

This is a friendly reminder that your rent of $1,800 is due on February 1st.

Payment methods:
- Online portal: tenant.propertymanagement.com
- Check: Mail to 100 Management Way
- Auto-pay: Already enrolled

Thank you for being a great tenant!

Property Management Team
emails.notes: Rental payment reminder - property related but not a purchase/sale transaction

emails.body: the docs r attached
emails.notes: Edge case: No subject, very brief body, relies on attachment context

emails.subject: Your Home Value Has Increased!
emails.body:
Great news, homeowner!

Based on recent market data, your home at 456 Your Street has increased in value!

Estimated value: $425,000
Change from last month: +$5,000

Thinking of selling? Get a free home valuation from our top agents.

[Get My Free Valuation]

Zillow
emails.notes: Zillow home value update - not a transaction but mentions selling

emails.subject: Wire Transfer Instructions - IMPORTANT
emails.body:
IMPORTANT - CLOSING FUNDS

Dear Buyer,

Please find the wire transfer instructions for your closing below:

Bank: First National Bank
Routing: 123456789
Account: 987654321
Amount: $125,450.00
Reference: 555 Cedar Lane Closing

⚠️ NEVER send funds based on email instructions without verbal confirmation.
Call our office at (555) 123-4567 to verify these instructions.

First Title Company

emails.subject: Updated Wire Instructions - URGENT
emails.body:
URGENT UPDATE!

Our banking information has changed. Please use the new wire instructions below for your closing:

Bank: Offshore Bank
Routing: 999999999
Account: 111111111

Please send funds immediately to avoid closing delays.

Title Company
emails.notes: Wire fraud attempt - spoofed sender address (f1rsttitle vs firsttitle)

emails.subject: Happy Birthday from Your Realtor!
emails.body:
Happy Birthday, John!

Wishing you a wonderful day filled with joy and celebration.

It's been a pleasure working with you, and I hope your new home brings you many happy memories.

If you ever need anything or know someone looking to buy or sell, don't hesitate to reach out!

Cheers,
Sarah Johnson
ABC Realty
(555) 987-6543
emails.notes: Birthday email from realtor - mentions buy/sell but not a transaction

emails.subject: Repair Request - 444 Oak Lane Unit 2B
emails.body:
Hello Property Manager,

I'm writing to report a maintenance issue in my unit:

Issue: Leaking faucet in kitchen
Urgency: Medium - bucket is catching the drip for now
Best time to access: Weekdays after 5 PM

Please let me know when a maintenance person can come by.

Thanks,
Tenant Unit 2B
emails.notes: Property maintenance request - not a transaction

emails.subject: Final Walk-Through Scheduled
emails.body:
Hi,

The final walk-through for 999 Walnut Way has been scheduled:

Date: March 19, 2024
Time: 4:00 PM

This is your chance to verify that:
- All agreed repairs have been completed
- The property is in the expected condition
- All fixtures and appliances are present

Please meet us at the property. Call if you have questions.

Buyer's Agent
